attributes.description: THIS VEHICLE IS SOMETHING OUT OF THIS WORLD WITHOUT A SHADOW OF A DOUBT THE CLEANEST, MOST ORIGINAL BUBBLE LIGHT COROLLA CURRENTLY AVAILABLE ANYWHERE IN SA Belonged to the most charming lady who we know personally, true story, all the paperwork to back it up THE CAR WAS HER PRIDE AND JOY full service history up to date THICK FILE WITH ORIGINAL SALE INVOICE AND EVERY SERVICE INVOICE SINCE NEW including service recently completed. ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS CONDITION Storm grey Metallic, the interior is perfect, the body is immaculate, the car is simply quite stunning. THEY DONT MAKE THEM LIKE THIS ANYMORE, just so smooth and easy to drive. This is a very rare opportunity to own the most iconic corolla ever made and WITH CRAZY LOW MILEAGE AND COMPREHENSIVE SERVICE HISTORY. must be seen and driven to be appreciated. Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security AA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
